title: Watch Face - Chuen
summary: Round Watch Face with weather and theme options
description: ★ 12 or 24 hour watch display★ C and F temperature options★ Choose between 6 accent colors★ Aqua and Grey theme options★ Black & White ambient modeChuen Watch Face works with square and round watches!All settings are configurable from the watch
descriptionHTML:
★ 12 or 24 hour watch display
★ C and F temperature options
★ Choose between 6 accent colors
★ Aqua and Grey theme options
★ Black & White ambient mode

Chuen Watch Face works with square and round watches!

All settings are configurable from the watch
comments: Good details and depth Would be a 5 star watch face if it were not for this NN.800000000000000001°F Fahrenheit bug.
Im loving this! A little dark but I like dark and minimal stuff!
recentChanges: Fixed last known location for weather.
